title: How are you hiding from 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: I for one don’t have a 5G phone, so their radiation can’t reach me!! That statement that I just made is irrational. The power level of the frequencies that 5G is so small that they can’t cause any damage. As the Sun puts out more power than any radio system on earth, even with a magnetic shield that the earth provides, you receive more total energy in that band than what a 5G cell antenna puts out. You and every other living creature on the planet have evolved to not get much damage if any from it. These trolls that put out that disinformation on 5G need to get a life and stop unnecessarily scaring people.

Having been repeatedly exposed to electromagnetic waves thousands of times as powerful as any 5G antenna while working with broadcast transmitters and military radar systems, and having suffered no harm, I see no reason to hide from 5G. I have outlived more than half of my high school graduating class and remain in good health. Don’t let FALSE conspiracy theories rule your life.
